abstract: The Ponseti method, as it is known, can be taught to nondoctors, making it a clubfoot treatment that can be readily transferred anywhere in the world.
snippet: The Ponseti method, as it is known, can be taught to nondoctors, making it a clubfoot treatment that can be readily transferred anywhere in the world.
lead_paragraph: MY morning sprint through the pages of this newspaper typically goes like this: the front page, the corrections, the sports section (during baseball season) and the obituaries.

headline.main: Finding Inspiration in a Doctor’s Legacy
headline.print_headline: Finding Inspiration in a Doctor’s Legacy
